title: Rep. Victoria Spartz Town Hall, March 28, 2025 (Muncie Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any police incident report concerning or relating to the town halls hosted by Rep. Victoria Spartz at 18880 N. East St., Westfield, Indiana on March 28, 2025, and at Muncie City Hall, 300 N. High St., Muncie, IN 47305 on March 29, 2025.

2. Any video or audio recorded by police at the location of either town hall before, during, or after the town hall event. This includes any audio or video recorded by body camera device, handheld camera or phone, or vehicular recording device.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: Florida Public Records Request – August 27, 2024 Arrest of Jonathan Costa After High-Speed Ferrari Pursuit

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Florida Public Records Request – August 27, 2024 Arrest of Jonathan Costa After High-Speed Ferrari Pursuit
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of all public records related to the high-speed pursuit and arrest of Jonathan Costa on August 27, 2024, involving a stolen Ferrari Spider and law enforcement activity in both St. Johns and Flagler Counties.

Specifically, I request:

All body-worn camera footage from Flagler County deputies involved in the pursuit, perimeter setup, and arrest of the suspect(s) at the residence on Royal Palm Lane in Palm Coast.

All dashcam footage from patrol units engaged in the pursuit or arrest.

Any aerial surveillance footage used by Flagler County deputies or supporting agencies.

Arrest and incident reports filed by Flagler County Sheriff’s deputies

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
